posts.title: Martinis
posts.text: MartinisMartinis E.S.T. 1930s,were mixed 1part Gin & 1Dry-Vermouth. Later in 40s, became 2/3 Gin & 1 Dry Vermouth. Now, Martinis bases Gin/Vodka + Dry Vermouth. We use StrightUp Glass or on the Rocks Glass. Also, Stemmed Glass/Old-Fashioned Glass. Martinis12345HighGlass as Shaker, Ice in.0.5oz dry vermouth2oz gin/vodkaSTIRolive Dry M.1234ice0.25oz dryVermouth2oz gin/vodkaolive Extra Try M.123one drop dry vermouth, make it In and Out. *just the ice has vermouth taste*2.5oz gin/vodkaolive the Martinis Garnish with Onion is called GIBSON. Popular Brands Gin Absolute, Smirnoff, Grey Goose, Keteone, Belvedere. Vodka Beefeater, Tanqueray, Bombay Sapphire. Flavored Martinis

posts.title: Sour & Collins Drinks
posts.text: SOURMIX is made of concertrate of Lemon/ Lime/ Sugar/ sometime Egg whites.This drinks are handshaken & Blened. GLASSES: (page 23) Rocks/ Collins/ Fiest Grande >for Margaritas/ Beer Mug/ Hurricane **>Frozen Drinks ** / Martinis Garnish: all Sour Drinks with Cherry/ LIT with Lemon/ Margaritas with Lime DaiquiriStraight up/ on the Rocks/ FrozenStrawberry Daiquiri no sour mix, with Stawberry Daiquiri Mix 12345in the stright up glass=Maritini glass / rock glass / hurricane glass.1.5oz (6 counts) Light Rum, e.g.BacardiSour Mixshakecherry and Lime BELOW USE MARITINIS GLASS OR ROCK GLASS Whiskey Sour12341.5oz whiskeysour-mixshakecherry Midori Sour12341.5oz Midori (melon liqueur)Sour-mixshakecherry Amaretto Sour12341.5oz Amaretto (sweet almond liqueur)Sour-mixshakecherry ##THE COLLINS GLASS Tom - GinJohn - Whisky Collins - Tall Glass Tom (Gin) Collins123456ice1oz GinSour-mixshakeclub soda / 7 upcherry + orange John(whiskey) Collins123456ice in collins glass1oz whiskeysour-mixshake/ club soda / 7-upcherry + orange Jock(Scotch) Collinsthe other types: Vodka Collins/ Rum Collins/ Brandy Collins Sloe Gin Fizz123456ice 1oz sloe ginsour-mixshakeclub soda / 7-upcherry + orange MARGARITASINVENTED IN Mexico, liquor with Tequila.Various of flavors: Melon/ Raspberry/ Peach/ Strawberry etc. Frozen, Rocks, Strright up Margaritas1234561oz Tequlia0.5oz Triple SecSourMixhint of Lime JuiceshakeLime Weadge Blue-Rita: replace Triple Sec to Blue CuracaoCadillac-Rita: 1oz Patron + 0.5oz Cointreau, Lime Squeeze, SourMix, Float of Grand MarnierLong Island ICED TEA2 COUNTS 0.5oz EACH of HOUSE LIQOURS:vodka, gin, rum, tequila, triple sec with Sour-mix and Coke float L.I.T.123456below o.5oz eachvodka, gin, rum, tequila, triple secsour-mixshakecokelemon Long Beach Ice Tea123450.5oz each of vodka, gin, rum, tequila, triple secsour-mixshakecranberry juicelemon Adios MoFo a.k.a. posts.title: Highballs
posts.text: HIGHBALLS is 1 part liquor to 2 parts of mixer. 1oz 4 pours /1.5oz 6 pours /2oz 8pours GLASSES: Standard/ English / Footed (page 27) highball123ice1 oz whiskey: Scotch/ Bourbon/ whiskey etc.Gingle Ale Gin & Tonic1234ice1oz Gin TonicLime Wedge 7 & 71234ice1oz Seagram's 77up/spritelime the other Brand : crown&7, Jack&coke, Beam&Coke etc. Cuba Libre1234icerum (light rum: Barcardi)cokeLime Screw Driver1234ice1oz vodkaorange juiceorange slice Harvey Wallbanger a.k.a.
